wikitext.*:
'''Horn''' can refer to:

* [[Horn (rider of Rohan)|Horn]] (died {{TA|3019}}), a Rider of [[Rohan]] who fell in the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]].
* [[Horn]]s, musical instruments:
** [[Great Horn]], the horn of [[Boromir]].
** [[Horn-call of Buckland]], a signal to [[Hobbits]] that there were invaders. 
** [[Horn of the Mark]] given to [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]].
** [[Valaróma]], the horn of [[Oromë]].
** [[Windbeam]], the Horn of [[Elendil]] in an early draft.
* [[Oromë]], one of the [[Valar]], whose name means "horn-blowing".
* ''[[ras]]'', or "horn", a type of mountain:
** [[Starkhorn]], a mountain to the south of [[Edoras]].
** [[Caradhras|Redhorn]], or ''Caradhras'', the largest of the [[Mountains of Moria]].
** [[Methedras]], the most southerly peak of the [[Misty Mountains]].

{{disambig}}
